name: Head Taylor
text: I just bought this car for my family, it's so cool! It's fast speedy and it gets better every time I drive it, I also own a 2021 Tesla model 3

name: Margo Valdez
text: After two years totally trouble free, this vehicle is the best yet. I'm totally pleased but looking forward to my next gen Model X when Tesla perfects the 4680 battery.

name: Lily Alston
text: So far best car ever. I'm an auto mechanic & I know electric cars will eventually take my job away but can't really hate on the beauty & reliability of this car . This is the future .

name: Morris Bullock
text: You cannot get an appointment to fix your car. It takes over a month just to make an appointment.

name: Mcfadden Morgan
text: Car of the future meets AI voice systems and blows away any competition. Enable VoiceAdmins and have your calls taken while you drive!!

name: Patricia Burnett
text: I'm totally pleased but looking forward to my next gen Model X when Tesla perfects the 4680 battery.

name: Malone Peterson
text: Technology system sucks!!! It's not accurate and this car is nothing but continuous mechanical system problems. Etc...

name: Rice Kramer
text: 21st century auto at the right time. Elon is truly a genus. Easy to drive. Tech is amazing. Speed is super car class. Support is top drawer. Very well thought out controls and functions

name: Barber Boyle
text: I just bought this car for my family, it's so cool! It's fast speedy and it gets better every time I drive it, I also own a 2021 Tesla model 3

name: Conley Cross
text: I'm already recommending Tesla to everyone I know! The car is amazing! FUN TO DRIVE! Saves money on gas! No oil changes! Nothing like it!

name: Hilda Foley
text: This is my second Tesla and Ive loved them both. My first was a used Model S purchased through Tesla.

name: Leah Anderson
text: Its just NOT ready for primetime

name: Susanne Gates
text: Don't Buy a Tesla if expect to need autobody
